Moreover <S%H7327>Ruth<s%> the <S%H4125>Moabitess<s%>, the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H4248>Mahlon<s%>, have I <S%H7069>purchased<s%> to be my <S%H802>wife<s%>, to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead<s%> upon his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, that the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead<s%> be not cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H5973>among<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and from the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%>: ye are <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

and let thy <S%H1004>house<s%> be like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%>, whom <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> unto <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> thee of this young <S%H5291>woman<s%>.

So <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7327>Ruth<s%>, and she became his <S%H802>wife<s%>; and he went <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H3068>her<s%>, and Jehovah <S%H5414>gave<s%> her <S%H2032>conception<s%>, and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And he shall be unto thee a <S%H7725>restorer<s%> of <S%H5315>life<s%>, and a <S%H3557>nourisher<s%> of thine old <S%H7872>age<s%>, for thy <S%H3618>daughter-in<s%>-law, who <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H2896>thee<s%>, who is better to thee than <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, hath borne <S%H3205>him<s%>.
And <S%H5281>Naomi<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%>, and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it in her <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and became nurse unto <S%H539>it<s%>.

And the women her <S%H7934>neighbors<s%> <S%H7121>gave<s%> it a <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There is a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H5281>Naomi<s%>; and they <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5744>Obed<s%>: he is the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.
